sentence: State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski said cash bail should remain in place for violent crimes or dangerous, repeat offenders.
author: Daniel Bice
title: Bice: U.S. Senate candidate Mandela Barnes favors eliminating cash bail nationally, aide says

sentence: Nelson trailed at 5 percent, and Wisconsin state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski came in at 3 percent support.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Barnes posts $1.7M first quarter number in Wisconsin Senate race
